div.div: Changes in immune measures (Δ Cumulative, see Fig. 1) of great tits in relation to the Borrelia burgdorferis.l. infection rate (A) and overall tick exposure (B).
div.p: Least squares regression lines are fitted. Except for the presented Tick x Borrelia interaction in NOx, slopes that differ statistically significantly from zero are indicated by a solid line. The size of the symbols portrays the actual difference in the acute response between infestation 3 and 1 (Δ Acute, see Fig. 1). Triangles represent the birds that died during infestation 3.
